basics.name: Giancarlo Papa
basics.label: Full-Stack Web Developer (PHP, Laravel, Vue.js, Python)
basics.summary: Full-stack web developer with 15+ years of experience building and maintaining enterprise-grade applications and scalable web solutions. Strong expertise in PHP, Laravel, Vue.js, Docker, and cloud-native environments (GCP). Experienced in leading migration projects, optimizing performance, and integrating AI-driven solutions.

work.name: Sunrise Communications AG
work.summary: Leading full-stack development of internal enterprise applications. Driving modernization of legacy platforms and cloud migration to GCP.
highlights: Developed and maintained mission-critical intranet applications used across the company.
Modernized legacy PHP/JS applications to Laravel 12, Vue 3, and Nuxt 3.
Led migration from RHEL 6/7 to RHEL 9, Docker adoption, and CI/CD pipelines (GitLab, Jenkins, Bitbucket).
Integrated Oracle and MySQL backends with LDAP/AD authentication.
Introduced AI/LLM integrations for customer service efficiency (Vertex AI, Gemini).

work.name: Sicilia On Line S.r.l.
work.summary: Managed and developed a leading regional news portal with responsibility for full-stack development, system administration, and creative campaigns.
highlights: Redesigned and rebuilt the entire siciliaonline.it portal (2011).
Implemented CMS-based websites (Joomla, WordPress, Typo3, Drupal).
Developed e-commerce solutions and payment gateways.
Configured LAMP servers and optimized high-availability infrastructure.
Implemented SEO, analytics, and social media integrations (Open Graph, FB plugins).

work.name: Freelancer
work.summary: Provided freelance IT consulting and web design for SMEs.
highlights: Configured Linux and Windows servers, Samba, Postfix, Bind, and Hylafax.
Deployed LAMP servers and developed websites for local businesses.
